reviews.review_title: Perfect hotel for a couple, just outside the town.
reviews.positive_text:
Really cosy and comfortable hotel just outside the main town, 5 minute walk and you're at the bay.

Bed was really comfy, air con was incredible, room was spacious, and the toilet was separate to the open plan shower/sink area, really well thought out.

Swimming pool was plenty big enough and the bar/food area was clean and modern, just an all round very enjoyable experience, especially for the price!

I would 100% recommend this hotel and we will definitely be using it again.

reviews.review_title: Lovely hotel with bar and leisure facilities on the edge of La Rochelle near the canal cycle path
reviews.positive_text: Located a 10 minute walk from the station along the canal pedestrian/cycle path. The ambiance in the hotel with a large lounge, tables, bar, TV and games areas was excellent for families and singles alike. This leads to a wrap-around terrace and the swimming pool.  My room was clean & comfortable with 2 chairs and a desk area with tea tray.  The bed linen was especially soft & light. The street and train noise was minimal despite the room facing it.  In room air conditioning and ventilation & fresh air in the lounge.
reviews.negative_text: Cleanliness in the common areas (lounge and toilets) was lacking with so many families in summer.  (But it was cleaned well during off peak times.). The pool opening at 9 or 10 am.  I had been hoping to swim earlier (or late evening) in order to avoid crowded conditions.
